input.sentences: vacationing here is really awesome . beautiful sea water .
the beaches is beautiful also . breeze feels good .
family decided to take photos of different sites for memories .
beautiful picture of sea rolling in with different shells landing on island .
an awesome look across the the midnight blue sky against the water .
output.sentences: I just love the crisp ocean air & the beautiful blue skies.
While I'm there I like to take in the sights & get plenty of photos to show people back home.
I always come home with a bag of seashells instead of buying souvenirs.
Watching the sun sink into the Pacific, I feel at peace with the world.
